text: Ronald Clyde Gardenhire (born October 24, 1957) is the manager of the Detroit Tigers. He was born in West Germany. He was a shortstop for the New York Mets from 1981 to 1985 and managed the Minnesota Twins from 2002 to 2013. He replaced Brad Ausmus as manager of the Tigers following the 2017 season. ==Other websites== * * Managerial record at Baseball-Reference.com Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:German sportspeople Category:Detroit Tigers managers Category:Minnesota Twins Category:New York Mets players
title: Ron Gardenhire
